nodes.text: Nu Squadron was an Imperial Navy squadron of Alpha-class Xg-1 Star Wings serving the Galactic Empire. At some point, they were dispatched to a rocky arid planet in what was presumably a bombing run against an enemy base. During the Galactic Civil War, they fought the Alliance to Restore the Republic at the Bruanii Sector and later rogue Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin's forces in his insurrection.
